__e: Kind of reminds me of a turtle I once had.
Well, every year, Stan checks out these artificial memory chambers from the CIA, plops you suckers in and then programs a great vacancy.
"You see a tortoise lying on his back in the hot sun.
He's a turtle and he doesn't like being in the classroom at night all by himself.
Man looked at him and says, "That's not possible, son." He reached down, he took the turtle away from him, he looked at it.
Because I wanted a turtle, and he was like, "No..."
